title: How to Make Homemade Chipotle Sauce
directions: Place all ingredients in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth about 2-3 minutes or until the mixture is nice and creamy. Pour into a jar or small bowl and refrigerate for up to 4 weeks. Be sure to keep it in the fridge! Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 chipotle chile in adobo sauce plus 1 tsp. sauce (canned)
